Attributes.description: Analytic and theoretical consideration of the interrelation of word formation, sound patterning, and meaningful sentence structure. Not offered every year.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of LING 300, LING 311. (Recommended: LING 327)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:30, Building: Hebb, Room: 116
